headline: Exa Capital Named to the 2025 Inc. 5000 List of America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies
summary: DALLAS, August 12, 2025--Exa Capital, the holding company dedicated to long-term stewardship of founder-led software businesses, is proud to announce its inclusion on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list – Inc. Magazine’s annual ranking of the fastest-growing privately held companies in the United States. This milestone reflects Exa’s strong momentum, disciplined growth, and distinctive approach to business ownership that prioritizes preservation, performance, and people.

headline: Software stocks in Europe fall on concerns over AI pitfalls
summary: Software stocks in Europe fell sharply on Tuesday, with heavyweight SAP sliding more than 6% amid concerns over the risks that artificial intelligence could pose to this part of the technology sector. SAP was briefly set for its biggest one-day drop since October 2020 and was last down 5.5%. Meanwhile, Dassault Systemes, Sage and Nemetschek fell between 4% and 10%, making tech the worst-performing sector in Europe.

raw.headline: Software stocks in Europe fall on concerns over AI pitfalls

Meanwhile, Dassault Systemes, Sage and Nemetschek fell between 4% and 10%, making tech the worst-performing sector in Europe.

headline: Sanderson Firm Ranked #92 on the 2025 Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Companies in America
summary: Sanderson Firm PLLC, a nationwide trailblazer in the Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) compliance industry, is proud to announce its debut on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list, securing the #92 spot among the fastest-growing privately held companies in the United States. The firm's client base comprises some of America's most well-recognized insurance carriers, self-insured employers, and third-party administrators.

headline: Response Labs Named to Inc. 5000 America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies list for the Fourth Straight Year
summary: Response Labs, a leading digital CRM and Loyalty agency based in Baltimore, once again claims its place on the prestigious Inc. 5000 list of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in America, ranking No. 3,474 for 2025. This marks the fourth consecutive year that Response Labs has been recognized for its unwavering commitment to growth and groundbreaking innovation in the marketing industry.

headline: Accrete, Inc. Debuts on the 2025 Inc. 5000 List, Among America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies
summary: Accrete, the AI company whose Knowledge Engine platform enables autonomous decisions used by governments and corporations, has earned its place on the Inc. 5000 list of America's fastest-growing private companies. The ranking reflects three-year revenue growth fueled by rising demand for AI agents that can be trusted to make complex decisions in mission-critical environments.

headline: 2 Mid-Cap Stocks on Our Watchlist and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.
